definition: musk deer (Moschus moschiferus)/also called 香獐子
cat/CL:隻|只[zhi1]/(dialect) to hide oneself/(coll.) modem

sentences.english: French perfume masters say the most fundamental ingredient in their fragrances is civet20).
sentences.chinese: 法國的香水大師說香水最爲基本的原料是麝貓香。

sentences.english: It is a pungent symbol of pride for the country.
sentences.chinese: 作爲氣味符號，麝貓香是法國的驕傲。
